body.description: The TEMPUR-Cloud Pillow offers cushion-soft comfort with the signature adaptive support of proprietary TEMPUR material. Experience personalized comfort and support night after night with material that precisely adapts to your head, neck, and shoulders—and returns to its shape in the morning. Back, side, and stomach sleepers will love the extra-soft feel and traditional shape. Features a knit, removable washable cover..

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The TEMPUR-Cloud Pillow features a low profile and an ultra-conforming, extra-soft feel to provide a restful night's sleep — especially for back and stomach sleepers. 100% polyester knit and hypoallergenic cover that is removable and washable to keep the pillow fresh for years to come. A single piece of formed, extra-soft TEMPUR Material adapts to your shape for personalized comfort and support.

TEMPUR-Cloud Pillow TEMPUR-Symphony Pillow TEMPUR-Essential Support Pillow Key Feature Cushion-soft comfort with a traditional shape and low-profile design Includes a gently arched side for back sleepers and a flatter side for everyone else. Conforming support of Tempur Material combined with lightweight comfort Feel Extra Soft Soft Soft Height 5-Inch 5-Inch 4.25-Inch Material Tempur Material Tempur Material Tempur Material Sleep Position All Sleep Positions All Sleep Positions Back and Stomach Sleepers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable .. Perfect size and price was right!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I REALLY wanted to love this pillow... I hate it. UPDATE ADDED
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is heavy - I'm in relatively good shape and each time I move this, I feel like I'm getting a workout - just dead weight. Pillows shouldn't be this heavy.It's ridiculously flat. Any weight whatsoever on it, makes it go completely flat. I mean flat like well under an INCH flat. If I were to measure it, it would most likely be 1/2" high once (no kidding) when my head is on it.I am a stomach sleeper (worst position) and I bought this thinking I could use it lengthwise under my stomach and head - maybe providing some support... It's exactly the same as using nothing!I happened to have a back issue just days after receiving this and this forced me to have to sleep on my back and side for a few days. Again I tried, oh how I tried! I literally folded the pillow in half, trying to "stuff" it under my neck" for support and still it was SO flat and so heavy that I couldn't stand it. I placed it under my spine and it was the same as having NOTHING there at all.My breaking point - the HEAT. Incredible heat is generated from this pillow and this is when I found myself throwing it off the bed in the middle of the night - and that was memorable since it feels like flinging a bowling ball! Also, I'm in MN, and the house temp is about 65 degrees at night!! I have NEVER had "heat" issues.After spending $45 on it, I'm not ready to chuck it but, seriously, this is the worse pillow I have ever owned, and I have had a LOT of pillows, typically high end pillows. I love the feel of the memory foam (when you press your hand into it) BUT, the con's outweigh the pros - by a longshot!Do yourself a favor a get a SOFT MyPillow. Forget politics, his pillows are fantastic. The first one I ever bought is nearly 20 years old and still looks and feels brand new after countless washings. Before buying this pillow, I would re-buy pillows on a regular basis - about every 6 months. When I came on here searching for pillows, I was looking to find something specific to stomach sleeping.If you like flat, heavy and hot pillows - you're gonna love this baby. If not, you may want to reconsider, especially at $45.00.Update 05/22/2022: Okay, I have no idea what happened. The pillow remains flat, heavy and does need to be flipped several times a night BUT, for some crazy reason, it has become my FAVORITE pillow - and I have many! Maybe it's the ugly dog factor... you spend so much time dwelling on it that you bond with it on a subconscious level, who knows!Regardless, I came in here tonight to possibly buy a second one. Price has gone up - a lot! I love it for support, under my neck and recently under my hips (I have a back ache) but most of all, it's a dream for stomach sleepers - although I really want to break this habit. I still have my "My pillow" next to me as well along with two travel sized pillows - it's complicated!I don't have any answers but, for me - this flat-ish, overweight lug really works!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I bought this pillow because I bought an older Tempur-Pedic pillow over 10 years ago and I needed a replacement. There are 2 thing# about this pillow that I don't like but it's only due to preference It is a little bit thin I wish it was thicker and also I wish it was more firm like the first Tempur-Pedic pillow that I bought but other than that it works great and I fall asleep and it's super comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Most comfortable pillow Ive ever slept with. Seems expensive, but the quality of sleep I've had since purchasing justifies the expense.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Firm but not too firm
reviews.reviewText: I really like this pillow. It conforms to your head. Best pillow I have had in a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Too firm, not comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I was so disappointed in this pillow. When we bought our new matress, I tried this pillow in the matress store, and it was so comfortable, but too expensive there. The Amazon price is amazing, but the pillow did not feel the same. It is too firm, and did not supply comfortable support. From what I have read and been told, this is not an Amazon issue. It is a Tempur-Pedic material problem. Most Tempur-Pedic pillows are wonderful, but some are flawed. I evidently received a flawed product.

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. My video review says it all, but I would definitely recommend this pillow, it’s very soft and molds to your head for comfort and ease of sleep

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable and soft pillow for sleeping.
reviews.reviewText: I used it to place behind my neck as a neck-pillow. Which is very soft and tender for my neck in sleeping.

Después de una larga recuperación de un esguince de cuello me costaba mucho trabajo encontrar almohada, esta es perfecta: una caricia para tu cuello.Yo prefiero la suave, vale la pena probarlas en vivo.No me arrepiento de comprarla y la he recomendado a mi familia.
